Text:
If you like this book, see it you can find the book 'The Moon is Hell" by John W. Campbell. Published in the USA by Ace Books 1973 and First Nel Paperback Edition January 1975.

The book is a diary of Dr. Thomas R. Duncan PhD.  The first long expedition to the Moon is preparing to return to Earth.  The relief ship crashes and the expedition must now survive till a rescue ship can be built and launched.  Supplies will not last.  This is the journal of their amazing survival and how they conquered the Moon.
